title: megacities video
text: Developed this AR to help viewers explore artwork from the megacities.world series. These artworks are a collage of multiple satellite images from one country. The AR app lets viewers explore and see the different cities that make up the composition, and also includes a video for each place for viewers to get a vibe from each place.
